main event: A civilian observer sighted a bright, silvery, halo circle object clinging to a cloud in Boise, Idaho.
interesting points: The object was observed for a few minutes,The object was stationary at an altitude of about 3,000 feet,The object was described as a round disc and was black and silver in color,It seemed to be clinging to a large cloud which contributed to its visibility,Local weather reports indicated clear skies at the time of the observation.
sighted object: a bright, silvery, halo circle object
witness description: Civilian observer, details of occupation not stated
